archimate:BusinessObject.name: DeviceDVRoutingDetails
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
"This association defines the set of DistanceVectorRoutingProtocols that are currently being used on this LogicalDevice. The supportsProtocol aggregation is used to determine if a particular Protocol (not just a DistanceVectorRoutingProtocol) is supported by this LogicalDevice.
The particular semantics of this association are defined by the DeviceDVRoutingDetails association class. "
